Description: 1 - dealer hit, 0 - dealer did not hit
Number of times the dealer hit
1 - dealer busts, 0 - dealer did not bust
List of the dealer's cards, in the order that they were dealt
1 - player hit, 0 - player did not hit
Number of times the player hit
1 - player busts, 0 - player did not bust
List of the player's cards, in the order that they were dealt
1 - player lost, 0 - player did not lose
1 - player won, 0 - player did not win
